author: .vbuterin
content: <@!364458974906548225> what's the latest progress on "state network" / "history network" stuff?

author: pipermerriam
content: I'm currently leaning towards building the network out on top of v5 discovery. Last I checked with Felix they were modifying the discovery protocol to support this type of extensibility.

author: pipermerriam
content: So I need to check back in on that and see about updating the prototype to use the newest v5 protocol at which point we could start playing with it in the wild.

author: pipermerriam
content: Still a bit of research to be done if the network is used for state to get the skip graph implemented.
